messages.message:
It seems like `advanced-apps.spec.ts` has been failing in multiple PRs. Shall we skip it for now?
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14480/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14483/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14478/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
https://cloud.cypress.io/projects/cfhedy/runs/14481/overview?roarHideRunsWithDiffGroupsAndTags=1
cc <!subteam^S07855GV3GV>
Makes sense to me, advanced apps is the most frequent cause of failures right now

`advanced-apps` is failing because of this issue  (https://instabase.atlassian.net/browse/INSIGHTS-7047)with apps that have ground truth sets :disappointed:

i’d prefer for us to find a different way to find `cypress-advanced-app` (ex: search by app name, instead of scrolling to the bottom) instead of skipping the test altogether

wdyt? @Weiming Wu
The live test might be fixable by just searching for the app name in the search bar
Oh because now we have search!! We couldn't do that before because we didn't ave search
I’ll put out a PR to update the `openPrivateApp` util
